markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Cat Curse](/Feats.aspx?ID=5563) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Misfortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=654" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
A creature within 30 feet you can see would succeed at a save.

</column>

---

You hiss a spiteful curse. The target rerolls the triggering saving throw and use the worse result.
name: Black Cat Curse
